1065600027459051520.text: Ya....shattering records because global climate change causes extreme weather patterns, not just heat waves.....happy thanksgiving to literally everyone except donald trump !https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/1065400254151954432 …

1065733179737325569.text: Let me guess, climate change is all trumps fault.SMH

1065824867235348485.text: Not at all. Climate change is caused by hundreds of years of humans polluting. Trump is president and has the power to enforce policies that will help clean up the environment, so rolling back environmental regulation and putting the whole planet in danger IS his fault yeah!

1065827892976857088.text: If you’re referring to the Paris agreement he would have signed it if it would have been a fair deal. Why should we have to pay for most of it while China and Russia pay virtually nothing and pollute the planet way more than us.

1065833081423241218.text: Bottom line is that Trump doesn’t believe in climate change. We NEED to be making changes to save our planet. We can make it political all we want, but climate change will eventually affect you and your loved ones no matter your views. We need to at least try to be better!
